translations: （英）特性描述；性格化（等于 characterization）

sentences.sentence: Others treated it as the same thing as depression, still others as the same thing as introversion, " he says. "We have found that these characterisations were incorrect. "
sentences.translation: 另外一些人把孤独看作抑郁症，还有些人把它看作内向，他说：“我们发现这些描述都是不正确的。”
